lead_paragraph: GRUBER--Victoria. Our Queen, beloved wife of late Jacob Gruber, peacefully passed in her home, family by her side on March 19, 2016. Devoted mother to Stella Acher (Ken Caine) and Ilana Gordon (Scott Gordon), doting "Omi" of five successful grandchildren, and great- grandmother of four. Concerto pianist in her youth, born in Czernowitz, and was a holocaust survivor. Omi lived elegantly, gracefully; filling our lives with beautiful music and warm Jewish meals. Service will be held Tuesday, 2pm at Sinai Chapels, Fresh Meadows, NY. 1/3
